text: I have used the blog subscription form in different modules in the theme and to change the form I have to change it in all the modules, is there any way that if I change it in one place it will change in all places?

Hey all,
New to HubSpot... We integrated a blog where the "Blog Subscribe" widget is hard-coded.... and in English (template: Interactive, blog listing).
We need to translate it to German and adjust the design (indentation "Recent posts") as well.
Is there any easy way to do that? Basic Python knowledge here.

Thanks a lot for your help?
Sabine

Hi <@U07F7SSPWKT>. The subscribe form should be available in the forms (Marketing -> forms). You can clone it, set the language to german in the settings, copy the form ID and paste it into the widget if it should be hard-coded. If the widget has a form select, select the form there :slightly_smiling_face:

If you have further questions - feel free to reach out via DM (I speak german too)
